about_the_game:
Be an Hell for the Others: unleash their envy with the good neighbor’s package!

With this DLC you will get:
  • 10 exclusive pieces of furniture for your in-game apartment, including a drawer with 4 slots! Admit it, it’s a Hell of a deal!
  • Unique Health Bar: show the Others that you are healthier than they are!
  • Printable Adam’s Journal, So that even your true Others can envy you!
  • Printable Map, To help you hunt;
  • Mobile & desktop wallpapers, To remember the serene city days;
  • Environmental music from around Century City, To forget the verses of Things…

How to access the content


Once bought, you'll receive the customized furniture in game.

You'll find the extra files in the game's install folder, which can be accessed by right clicking the game in the library, selecting "Properties" and then "Browse Local Files".

package_groups.title: Buy Hell is Others - Good Neighbor Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620 / AMD Radeon 530 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400F / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX480 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: An extra pack of juice for the good neighbors of Century City
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
